sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_app_template_detail</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Put vendor name onto g_scratchpad</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[var defaultVendorName = gs.hasRole('maint') ? 'ServiceNow' : ''; g_scratchpad.author = gs.getProperty('glide.appcreator.company.friendly_name', defaultVendorName); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-10-07 23:00:53</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>19274afd53833010c249ddeeff7b129e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Put vendor name onto g_scratchpad</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Application Templates" source="com.snc.apps_templates">1c2afca83cf1311068bcf327dfe37fff</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_19274afd53833010c249ddeeff7b129e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-10-07 23:05:38</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before_display</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=19274afd53833010c249ddeeff7b129e"/> </record_update>
